entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
